001import java.util.Stack;
002
003public class Player {
004
005    private String aName;
006
007    private Room aCurrentRoom;
008    private Stack<Room> aLastRooms;
009
010    private ItemList aItemList = new ItemList();
011    private int aMaxWeight;
012
013    public Player(String pName, Room pCurrentRoom, int pMaxWeight) {
014        this.aName = pName;
015        this.aCurrentRoom = pCurrentRoom;
016        this.aMaxWeight = pMaxWeight;
017
018        this.aLastRooms = new Stack<>();
019    }
020
021    public Room getCurrentRoom() {
022        return this.aCurrentRoom;
023    }
024
025    public ItemList getItemList() {
026        return this.aItemList;
027    }
028
029    public int getMaxWeight() {
030        return this.aMaxWeight;
031    }
032
033    public void setMaxWeight(int aMaxWeight) {
034        this.aMaxWeight = aMaxWeight;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Fonction permettant d'aller dans la salle souhaiter
039     * @param direction
040     * @return boolean true si il est dans la nouvelle piece else false
041     */
042    public boolean goRoom(final String direction) {
043        Room vNextRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit(direction);
044        if (vNextRoom == null) {
045            return false;
046        }
047
048        this.aLastRooms.push(this.aCurrentRoom);
049        this.aCurrentRoom = vNextRoom;
050        return true;
051    }
052
053    public boolean back() {
054        if (this.aLastRooms.isEmpty()) {
055            return false;
056        }
057
058        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aLastRooms.pop();
059        return true;
060    }
061
062    public boolean take(final String pItemName) {
063        Item item = this.aCurrentRoom.getItemList().getItemByName(pItemName);
064        if (item == null) {
065            return false;
066        } else if (this.aItemList.getWeight() + item.getWeight() > this.aMaxWeight) {
067            return false;
068        }
069
070        this.aCurrentRoom.getItemList().removeItem(item);
071        this.aItemList.addItem(item);
072
073        return true;
074    }
075
076    public boolean drop(final String pItemName) {
077        Item item = this.aItemList.getItemByName(pItemName);
078        if (item == null) {
079            return false;
080        }
081
082        this.aItemList.removeItem(item);
083        this.aCurrentRoom.getItemList().addItem(item);
084
085        return true;
086    }
087
088    public void use(Item pItem) {
089        this.aItemList.removeItem(pItem);
090        pItem.onUse(this);
091    }
092}
